00014 //---------------------------------------------------------
00015 //   ClefInfo
00016 //---------------------------------------------------------
00017 
00018 struct ClefInfo {
00019       char* sign;       // name for musicXml
00020       int line;         // for musicXml
00021       int yOffset;
00022       int pitchOffset;
00023       const char* name;
00024       ClefInfo(char* s, int l, int yo, int po, const char* n)
00025          : sign(s), line(l), yOffset(yo), pitchOffset(po), name(n)
00026             {
00027             }
00028       };
00029

00048 //---------------------------------------------------------
00049 //   ClefList
00050 //    this list is instantiated for every Instrument
00051 //    to keep track of clef changes
00052 //---------------------------------------------------------
00053 
00054 typedef std::map<const int, int>::iterator iClefEvent;
00055 typedef std::map<const int, int>::const_iterator ciClefEvent;
00056 
00057 class ClefList : public std::map<const int, int> {
00058    public:
00059       ClefList() {}
00060       int clef(int tick) const;
00061       void setClef(int tick, int idx);
00062       void read(QDomNode);
00063       void readEvent(QDomNode);
00064       void write(Xml&, const char* name) const;
00065       void removeTime(int, int);
00066       void insertTime(int, int);
00067       };
